001package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.core;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.log.LogApi;
004import io.restassured.http.Method;
005import io.restassured.specification.RequestSpecification;
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import java.util.Collection;
008import java.util.Collections;
009import java.util.HashMap;
010import java.util.List;
011import java.util.Map;
012
013/**
014 * A wrapper for {@link Endpoint} that allows adding query parameters, path parameters, and headers dynamically.
015 *
016 * <p>This class enables the creation of new endpoint instances with modified parameters while maintaining immutability.
017 *
018 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
019 */
020public class ParametrizedEndpoint<T extends Enum<T>> implements Endpoint<T> {
021
022   private final Endpoint<T> original;
023   private final Map<String, Object> pathParams;
024   private final Map<String, Object> queryParams;
025   private final Map<String, List<String>> additionalHeaders;
026
027   /**
028    * Constructs a new {@code ParametrizedEndpoint} with no additional parameters.
029    *
030    * @param original The original endpoint being wrapped.
031    */
032   ParametrizedEndpoint(Endpoint<T> original) {
033      this(original, new HashMap<>(), new HashMap<>(), new HashMap<>());
034   }
035
036   private ParametrizedEndpoint(Endpoint<T> original, Map<String, Object> pathParams, Map<String, Object> queryParams,
037                                Map<String, List<String>> additionalHeaders) {
038      this.original = original;
039      this.pathParams = Collections.unmodifiableMap(new HashMap<>(pathParams));
040      this.queryParams = Collections.unmodifiableMap(new HashMap<>(queryParams));
041      this.additionalHeaders = Collections.unmodifiableMap(new HashMap<>(additionalHeaders));
042   }
043
044   /**
045    * Retrieves the HTTP method of the endpoint.
046    *
047    * @return The HTTP method.
048    */
049   @Override
050   public Method method() {
051      return original.method();
052   }
053
054   /**
055    * Retrieves the URL path of the endpoint.
056    *
057    * @return The endpoint URL.
058    */
059   @Override
060   public String url() {
061      return original.url();
062   }
063
064   /**
065    * Retrieves the enum representation of the endpoint.
066    *
067    * @return The enum representing this endpoint.
068    */
069   @Override
070   public T enumImpl() {
071      return original.enumImpl();
072   }
073
074   /**
075    * Retrieves the base URL from the API configuration.
076    *
077    * @return The base URL.
078    */
079   @Override
080   public String baseUrl() {
081      return original.baseUrl();
082   }
083
084   /**
085    * Retrieves the headers, including any additional headers added dynamically.
086    *
087    * @return A map containing merged headers.
088    */
089   @Override
090   public Map<String, List<String>> headers() {
091      Map<String, List<String>> mergedHeaders = new HashMap<>(original.headers());
092      additionalHeaders.forEach(
093            (key, value) -> mergedHeaders.computeIfAbsent(key, k -> new ArrayList<>()).addAll(value));
094      return Collections.unmodifiableMap(mergedHeaders);
095   }
096
097   /**
098    * Prepares a {@link RequestSpecification} with path parameters, query parameters, and headers.
099    *
100    * @param body The request body (optional).
101    * @return The configured {@link RequestSpecification} instance.
102    */
103   @Override
104   public RequestSpecification prepareRequestSpec(Object body) {
105      RequestSpecification spec = original.prepareRequestSpec(body);
106      spec.pathParams(pathParams);
107      spec.queryParams(queryParams);
108      headers().forEach((key, values) -> spec.header(key, String.join(",", values)));
109
110      LogApi.info("Prepared RequestSpecification with pathParams: {}, queryParams: {}, headers: {}",
111            pathParams, queryParams, headers());
112
113      return spec;
114   }
115
116   /**
117    * Creates a new {@code ParametrizedEndpoint} with an added query parameter.
118    *
119    * @param key   The query parameter name.
120    * @param value The query parameter value.
121    * @return A new instance with the query parameter added.
122    * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the key or value is invalid.
123    */
124   @Override
125   public ParametrizedEndpoint<T> withQueryParam(String key, Object value) {
126      validateParam(key, value);
127      Map<String, Object> newQueryParams = new HashMap<>(this.queryParams);
128      newQueryParams.put(key, value);
129      return new ParametrizedEndpoint<>(this.original, this.pathParams, newQueryParams, this.additionalHeaders);
130   }
131
132   /**
133    * Creates a new {@code ParametrizedEndpoint} with an added path parameter.
134    *
135    * @param key   The path parameter name.
136    * @param value The path parameter value.
137    * @return A new instance with the path parameter added.
138    * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the key or value is invalid.
139    */
140   @Override
141   public ParametrizedEndpoint<T> withPathParam(String key, Object value) {
142      validateParam(key, value);
143      Map<String, Object> newPathParams = new HashMap<>(this.pathParams);
144      newPathParams.put(key, value);
145      return new ParametrizedEndpoint<>(this.original, newPathParams, this.queryParams, this.additionalHeaders);
146   }
147
148   /**
149    * Creates a new {@code ParametrizedEndpoint} with an added request header.
150    *
151    * @param key   The header name.
152    * @param value The header value.
153    * @return A new instance with the header added.
154    * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the key or value is invalid.
155    */
156   @Override
157   public ParametrizedEndpoint<T> withHeader(String key, String value) {
158      validateParam(key, value);
159      Map<String, List<String>> newHeaders = new HashMap<>(this.additionalHeaders);
160      newHeaders.computeIfAbsent(key, k -> new ArrayList<>()).add(value);
161      return new ParametrizedEndpoint<>(this.original, this.pathParams, this.queryParams, newHeaders);
162   }
163
164   /**
165    * Creates a new {@code ParametrizedEndpoint} with a multi-value request header.
166    *
167    * @param key    The header name.
168    * @param values A list of values for the header.
169    * @return A new instance with the header added.
170    * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the key or values are invalid.
171    */
172   @Override
173   public ParametrizedEndpoint<T> withHeader(String key, List<String> values) {
174      validateParam(key, values);
175      Map<String, List<String>> newHeaders = new HashMap<>(this.additionalHeaders);
176      newHeaders.computeIfAbsent(key, k -> new ArrayList<>()).addAll(values);
177      return new ParametrizedEndpoint<>(this.original, this.pathParams, this.queryParams, newHeaders);
178   }
179
180   /**
181    * Validates a parameter key and value.
182    *
183    * @param key   The parameter key.
184    * @param value The parameter value.
185    * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the key is null/empty or if the value is invalid.
186    */
187   private void validateParam(String key, Object value) {
188      if (key == null || key.isEmpty()) {
189         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Header key must not be null or empty");
190      }
191      if (value == null) {
192         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Header value must not be null for key: " + key);
193      }
194      if (value instanceof Collection && ((Collection<?>) value).isEmpty()) {
195         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Header value list must not be empty for key: " + key);
196      }
197   }
198
199}
